subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which state is part of the Rajputana region in the Indian subcontinent?
question_hi: भारत के भारतीय समृद्धि के माध्यमीकरण में Rajputana रेखां का समूच्छोड़ी है।
explanation_en:
The Rajputana region, consisting of four states, is part of the Indian subcontinent. Out of these, Rajasthan is one of them.
English:
Madhya Pradesh, Odisha aur Rajasthan ko Rajputana mein samuchchhed hai.
Hindi:
मध्यप्रदेश, ओड़िशा और राजस्थान ko Rajputana mein samuchchhed hai.
